channel.title: gnome on Mezalor
channel.description: Recent content in gnome on Mezalor

item.title: elementaryos, transparence terminal
item.description: $ gsettings get io.elementary.terminal.settings background 'rgba(46, 46, 46, 0.95)' $ gsettings set io.elementary.terminal.settings background 'rgba(46, 46, 46, 0.75)' $ gsettings set io.elementary.terminal.settings background 'rgba(46, 46, 46, 1)' $
